lead_paragraph: Darvish, the Rangers’ ace, threw off a full-size mound for the first time since he had Tommy John surgery in March 2015 and said he felt no pain.
snippet: Darvish, the Rangers’ ace, threw off a full-size mound for the first time since he had Tommy John surgery in March 2015 and said he felt no pain.
abstract: Texas Rangers pitcher Yu Darvish throws from full-size mound for first time since having Tommy John surgery and says he feels no pain.
